articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Klopp rues first-leg effect as Liverpool exit Europe - RTE.ie
articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp was left to rue their first-leg performance against Real Madrid as his side exited the Champions League after a stalemate at Anfield.
articles.content:
Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp was left to rue their dire first-leg performance against Real Madrid as his side exited the Champions League after a stalemate at Anfield.
The hosts could not fashion … [+2398 chars]

articles.title: Ancient tools 'reveal clues about gendered roles in European farming societies' - The Irish News
articles.description: Analysis of 400 stone objects from graves across Europe showed men and women were equal contributors to their community, researchers said.
articles.content:
Ancient tools found in graves across Europe suggest women and men performed specific gender-based tasks in farming societies about 5,000 years ago, according to scientists.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Denmark drops AstraZeneca vaccine for good, in European first - New Straits Times
articles.description: COPENHAGEN: Denmark announced Tuesday it would stop using the AstraZeneca Covid-19 vaccine altogether, becoming the first European country to do so over suspected rare but serious side effects.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: AstraZeneca shot is good if safety issues can be overcome, US official Fauci says - Rappler
articles.description: The AstraZeneca vaccine is being investigated by European regulators over concerns about rare cases of blood clots. It has not yet been approved in the United States.
articles.content: More than a dozen countries have at one time suspended use of the vaccine, but most have resumed, with some, including France, the Netherlands and Germany, recommending a minimum age.
